import React from 'react' import Img from './Img'; import { url } from '../url' import { Icon } from 'antd'; import 'antd/dist/antd.css' class PostListItem extends React.Component { state = { openComment: false } handleShowComment = () => { this.setState({ openComment: !this.state.openComment }) } render(){ return (
